thread.title: UFC athlete says he watched woman do cocaine at Astros game
thread.title_full: UFC athlete says he watched woman do cocaine at Astros game - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: UFC athlete says he watched woman do cocaine at Astros game
text:
Instagram A UFC fighter thinks this woman was doing drugs at the Houston Astros game on Sunday night. A baseball fan may have found an out-of-orbit experience while halfheartedly watching the Houston Astros big win.
The woman was witnessed by an Ultimate Fighting Championship fighter snorting what he believes was cocaine from Minute Maid Park’s grandstands.
Derrick Lewis captured the woman allegedly blowing coke on video as fellow fans went wild, disapproving at her alleged life choices.
“Damn shame,” Lewis wrote in an Instagram post Sunday night. “Lady doing coke at the Astros game.”
It’s not clear if the woman realized she was being recorded or if the mysterious substance was actually the illegal drug. She has not been identified.
The zoned-out woman only came back to Earth as fans around her cheered at an unspecified play, joining in with her own show of support.
The Astros beat the Kansas City Royals 4-2.
nhensley@nydailynews.com
